com.samsung.samm.common

Class SOptionPlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SOptionPlay

  • public class SOptionPlay
extends java.lang.Object
    The background audio option in an animated SAMM file.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO

        public static final int ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO
        The performance speed of the animation - auto
        Vary the playback speed of the animation according to the data size.
        This option allows larger files to be played faster so that they take less time to play.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setInvisibleBGImageAnimationOption

        public void setInvisibleBGImageAnimationOption(boolean bInvisibleBGImageAnimation)
        Sets whether or not to play an animation using a transparent background.
        bInvisibleBGImageAnimation If this is set to true, the animation is played using a transparent background.
        bInvisibleBGImageAnimation If bTransparentBGImageAnimation is set to false, the animation is played using a background image.
        The default value is false.
        Parameters:
        bInvisibleBGImageAnimation - Whether or not to play an animation using a transparent background
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setTransparentBGImageAnimation

        @Deprecated
public void setTransparentBGImageAnimation(boolean bTransparentBGImageAnimation)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets whether or not to play an animation using a transparent background.
        bTransparentBGImageAnimation If this is set to true, the animation is played using a transparent background.
        bTransparentBGImageAnimation If bTransparentBGImageAnimation is set to false, the animation is played using a background image.
        The default value is false.
        Use 'setInvisibleBGImageAnimationOption()' instead.
        Parameters:
        bTransparentBGImageAnimation - Whether or not to play an animation using a transparent background
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getInvisibleBGImageAnimationOption

      • setPlayBGAudioOption

        public void setPlayBGAudioOption(boolean bPlayBGAudio)
        Sets playback for background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        Plays the animation's background audio if you set bPlayBGAudio to true.
        Does not play the animation's background audio if you set bPlayBGAudio to false.
        The default is true.
        Parameters:
        bPlayBGAudio - Whether or not to play background audio
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setPlayBGAudio

        @Deprecated
public void setPlayBGAudio(boolean bPlayBGAudio)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets playback for background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        Plays the animation's background audio if you set bPlayBGAudio to true.
        Does not play the animation's background audio if you set bPlayBGAudio to false.
        The default is true.
        Use 'setPlayBGAudioOption()' instead.
        Parameters:
        bPlayBGAudio - Whether or not to play background audio
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getPlayBGAudioOption

        public boolean getPlayBGAudioOption()
        Gets the playback setting of the background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        Plays the animation's background audio if bPlayBackgroundAudio is true in setPlayBGAudio.
        Does not play the animation's background audio if bPlayBackgroundAudio is false in setPlayBGAudioOption.
        The default is true. (play Background Audio)
        Returns:
        Whether or not to play the current background audio
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • getPlayBGAudio

        @Deprecated
public boolean getPlayBGAudio()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the playback setting of the background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        Plays the animation's background audio if bPlayBackgroundAudio is true in setPlayBGAudio.
        Does not play the animation's background audio if bPlayBackgroundAudio is false in setPlayBGAudioOption.
        The default is true. (play Background Audio)
        Use 'getPlayBGAudioOption()' instead.
        Returns:
        Whether or not to play the current background audio
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setRepeatBGAudioOption

        public void setRepeatBGAudioOption(boolean bRepeatBGAudio)
        Sets playback to loop for background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        The background audio playback loops if bRepeatBGAudio is true.
        The background audio only plays once if bRepeatBGAudio is false.
        The default is false (play once).
        Parameters:
        bRepeatBGAudio - Whether or not to loop background audio playback
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setRepeatBGAudio

        @Deprecated
public void setRepeatBGAudio(boolean bRepeatBGAudio)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets playback to loop for background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        The background audio playback loops if bRepeatBGAudio is true.
        The background audio only plays once if bRepeatBGAudio is false.
        The default is false (play once).
        Use 'setRepeatBGAudioOption()' instead.
        Parameters:
        bRepeatBGAudio - Whether or not to loop background audio playback
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getRepeatBGAudioOption

        public boolean getRepeatBGAudioOption()
        Gets the playback loop setting of the background audio when playing an animated SAMM file, including files and voice recordings.
        The default is false (play once).
        Returns:
        Whether or not background audio playback loops
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setBGAudioVolume

        public boolean setBGAudioVolume(float fSetBGAudioInternalVolume)
        Software volume when playing background audio, including files and voice recordings.
        You can adjust the volume control regardless of the hardware key.
        Software volume adjustment settings range from 0.0f (mute) to 1.0f (maximum)
        It is advisable to set it to 1.0f (maximum).
        Returns false if fSetBGAudioInternalVolume is out of range.
        The default is 1.0f (maximum).
        Parameters:
        fSetBGAudioInternalVolume - The volume level of the software to set
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getBGAudioVolume

        public float getBGAudioVolume()
        Gets the software volume when playing back background audio, including files and voice recordings.
        You can adjust the volume control regardless of the hardware key.
        Software volume adjustment settings range from 0.0f (mute) to 1.0f (maximum).
        The default is 1.0f (maximum).
        Returns:
        The current volume level of the software
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setAnimationSpeed

        public boolean setAnimationSpeed(int nSpeed)
        Sets the animation speed to the specified option.
        Parameters:
        nSpeed - The animation speed option :
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_SLOW (animation speed - slow)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_NORMAL (animation speed - medium)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_FASTS (animation speed - fast)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO (animation speed - auto)
        The default is ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO (animation speed - auto).
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getAnimationSpeed

        public int getAnimationSpeed()
        Gets the animation speed.
        Returns:
        The current animation speed :
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_SLOW (animation speed - slow)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_NORMAL (animation speed - medium)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_FASTS (animation speed - fast)
        - ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO (animation speed - auto)
        - The default is ANIMATION_SPEED_AUTO (animation speed - auto).
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setStopBGAudioOption

        public void setStopBGAudioOption(boolean bStopBGAudio)
        Stops playback of background audio if playback of the SAMM animation stops. (when doAnimationStop function is called.)
        Stops playing background audio when doAnimationStop function is called if bStopBGAudio is true.
        Continues to play background audio regardless of the playback of the animation if bStopBGAudio is false.
        The default is true (stop playing background audio if the animation stops).
        Parameters:
        bStopBGAudio - Whether or not to stop playing background audio if the animation stops
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setStopBGAudio

        @Deprecated
public void setStopBGAudio(boolean bStopBGAudio)
        Deprecated. 
        Stops playback of background audio if playback of the SAMM animation stops.
        Stops playing background audio when the animation stops if bStopBGAudio is true.
        Continues to play background audio regardless of the playback of the animation if bStopBGAudio is false.
        The default is true (stop playing background audio if the animation stops).
        Use 'setStopBGAudioOption()' instead.
        Parameters:
        bStopBGAudio - Whether or not to stop playing background audio if the animation stops
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getStopBGAudioOption

        public boolean getStopBGAudioOption()

        Stops playing background audio when the animation stops if bStopBackgroundAudio was true in setStopBGAudioOption.
        The default is true (stop playing background audio if the animation stops).
        Returns:
        Whether or not playback of background audio stops if the animation stops
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • getStopBGAudio

        @Deprecated
public boolean getStopBGAudio()
        Deprecated. 

        Stops playing background audio when the animation stops if bStopBackgroundAudio was true in setStopBGAudioOption.
        The default is true (stop playing background audio if the animation stops).
        Use 'getStopBGAudioOption()' instead.
        Returns:
        Whether or not playback of background audio stops if the animation stops
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setSoundEffectOption

        public void setSoundEffectOption(boolean bSoundEffect)
        Sets playback to use sound effects if the SAMM animation is playing.
        Does not play sound effects when the animation stops if bSoundEffect is false.
        Plays sound effects if bSoundEffect is true.
        The default is true (play sound effects if the animation is playing).
        Parameters:
        bSoundEffect - Whether or not to play object sound effect
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • getSoundEffectOption

        public boolean getSoundEffectOption()
        Gets whether or not to play sound effects.
        The default is true (play sound effects).
        Returns:
        Whether or not sound effects play
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • setSoundEffectVolume

        public boolean setSoundEffectVolume(float fSetSoundEffectInternalVolume)
        Software volume when playback includes sound effects.
        You can adjust the volume control regardless of the hardware key.
        Software volume adjustment settings range from 0.0f (mute) to 1.0f (maximum)
        Returns false if the volume is out of range.
        The default is 1.0f (maximum).
        Parameters:
        fSetSoundEffectInternalVolume - The volume level of the software to set
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • getSoundEffectVolume

        public float getSoundEffectVolume()
        Gets the software volume when playback includes sound effects.
        You can adjust the volume control regardless of the hardware key.
        Software volume adjustment settings range from 0.0f (mute) to 1.0f (maximum).
        The default is 1.0f (maximum).
        Returns:
        The current volume level of the software
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3
